Activation.subject: Welcome to Tac-With-Bug!
Activation.body.welcome: Thanks for creating an account for the website Tac-With-Bug.
Activation.body.validation: To activate your account and log in, click this link:
Activation.body.regards: Have fun playing and best regards
PasswordReset.subject: Your new Tac-With-Bug password
PasswordReset.body.resetLink: Use this link to set a new password:
PasswordReset.body.info: You can ignore this message, if you did not request a new password. Your old password is still working.
NewSubscription.subject: Tac-With-Bug Sponsor
NewSubscription.body.thanks: Thank you for supporting me in developing and operating Tac-With-Bug!
NewSubscription.body.regards: Have fun playing and best from Munich
CancelSubscription.subject: End of your Tac-With-Bug support
CancelSubscription.body.thanks: Thank you for helping me develop and operate Tac-With-Bug in the past!
CancelSubscription.body.payments: Your subscription has been successfully completed and no further amounts will be deducted.
CancelSubscription.body.regards: I wish you all the best and send greetings from Munich
SubscriptionUpcomming.subject: Your TAC-With-Bug support
SubscriptionUpcomming.body.thanks: Thank you for supporting me in the development of TAC-With-Bug! This helps me to implement new features and cover the running costs for the platform.
SubscriptionUpcomming.body.payments: Your support will be extended tomorrow. If you want to end your support, you can end it on Tac-with-bug today or directly at PayPal.
TournamentReminder.subject: Tac-With-Bug Tournament
TournamentReminder.body.registration1: The registration phase for the Tac-With-Bug tournament
TournamentReminder.body.registration2: is finished and you have secured your participation!
TournamentReminder.body.timing: The games will be created automatically and appear in your games list. However, this process can take about a minute.
TournamentReminder.body.attachment: In the attachment of this mail you will find the calendar entries for the games.
TournamentInvitation.subject: Invitation to the Tac-With-Bug tournament
TournamentInvitation.body.invitation1: invited you to join the team
TournamentInvitation.body.complete: To complete the registration you have to navigate to the tournaments on Tac-With-Bug and click on the green tick next to your name.
PrivateTournamentInvitation.subject: Invitation to a private Tac-With-Bug tournament
PrivateTournamentInvitation.body.complet: To complete the registration you need to navigate on Tac-With-Bug to the tournaments and click the green hook next to your name.
NewFriendRequest.subject: You have a new Friendrequest on Tac-With-Bug
NewFriendRequest.body.message: You have a new friend request on Tac-With-Bug!
UnreadMessages.body.message: You have unread messages on Tac-With-Bug. Go to the website and check them out
UnreadMessages.subject: Unread messages on Tac-With-Bug
